reporter_caption.center: SHALLY v. CONTROL INSULATION, INC., 477 So.2d 716 (La. 1985)

caption.center: EDWIN C. SHALLY v. CONTROL INSULATION, INC., ET AL.

opinion.posture: In re Maryland Casualty Co.; applying for writ of certiorari and/or review; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. CA-3949; Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court, Div. "C", No. 83-2953.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Denied.
[2] DENNIS, J., would grant the writ.
